resources.string: By clicking on the menu button, the chat, profile and notification buttons become visible. When displayed, clicking on it again closes the menu
This button places you at your current location on the map
With the driver view, drivers registered as "Customer" will be displayed
With the Customer view, only users registered as "Driver" will be displayed, thus allowing you to subscribe to them
Through the chat you can talk with other users
In this menu you will find your profile picture, in addition to 6 submenus that are named below
Here you can view and update user account information
In this window you can manage your payment methods, either to receive money or make payments
In this section, active subscriptions or pending acceptance by the driver are displayed and managed
In this section you will find different options and menus, as well as notification preferences or information about the application
You can request the desactivation or deletion of your account through this section
Section to log out of the account and return to the authentication screen
In this menu you will find all notifications regarding your account, as well as new chats or updates on the status of a subscription
